title: Hearing Aids to Reach Millions with FDA Approval
itunes:title: Hearing Aids to Reach Millions with FDA Approval
description:
Dr. Frank Lin, Director of the Cochlear Center for Hearing at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, discusses the FDA's approval of the sale of over the counter hearing aids. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek Senior Investigative Reporter Susan Berfield share the details of Susan's Businessweek Magazine story How a Deadly Pathogen Spread at Abbott’s Infant Formula Plant. Bloomberg News Technology and E-Commerce Reporter Spencer Soper explains why Amazon is shutting down its primary care and telehealth service. And we Drive to the Close with Doug Ciocca, CEO at Kavar Capital.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Paul Sweeney. Producer: Paul Brennan 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
